alert.note: Alert for Southwest Wyoming (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 3:32PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wasatch...northwestern Duchesne...central Summit and southern Uinta Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 332 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Oakley to 7 miles northeast of Samak to 9 miles southwest of Mirror Lake. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oakley, Mirror Lake and Trial Lk. This includes Mirror Lake Highway between mile markers 17 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
